TopicTitle: Someone needs to make a challenge out of this

Articles.Content:
I don't know the forum username of the author of this video, but we as a community absolutely MUST make a challenge out of this! Establish a list of mods allowed, a standardized track, and race!

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/9LmNnkNTzFM?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

That was an interesting video. My thoughts were that once anti grav is realized it would make things easier. This video has shown me otherwise and now view anti grav with more cation.

One mod that would record the vessels flight path. Waiting for an update on [Persistent Trails](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/49216-1-0-2-Persistent-Trails-record-share-and-replay-track-data%21-%28May-14-V1-2%29)

 https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/49216-1-0-2-Persistent-Trails-record-share-and-replay-track-data!-%28May-14-V1-2%29

Its on the first page of this board

[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/129485-Boonta-Eve-Classic-A-Star-Wars-Podracer-Challenge](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/129485-Boonta-Eve-Classic-A-Star-Wars-Podracer-Challenge)
